EmailTemplate.description: This template is used to send email to users in case the delete batch job they have submitted to delete temporary user data uploaded through Data Loader has failed.
EmailTemplate.name: Client_User_Import_Email_Template_Failure
EmailTemplate.subject: Temporary client data deletion has failed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The temporary client data, imported by the Data Loader, could not be deleted. Retry deleting the temporary client data by navigating to Application Settings > Import Settings, and clicking the Delete button in the Temporary Client Data section.
This message was automatically generated when the BMC Remedyforce administrator deleted the temporary client data imported by the Data Loader.
